title: Convenient Coolangatta Apartment Escape Moments from the Beach with Two Pools & Tennis Courts
description:
Discover a world of coastal bliss in Coolangatta with a stylish stay in Gold Coast's most southerly tip, situated moments from the surf-friendly shores of Coolangatta Beach. Take a dip in the property's heated indoor and outdoor pools, tee off at the mini golf course and serve and volley it up at the tennis courts.

After a day of exploring the scenic Marine Parade, visiting Greenmount Beach and Rainbow Bay, retreat to your spacious room or apartment, imbued with all modern amenities. The adjacent Twin Towns Services Club is home to a number of restaurants for all your culinary needs, or you can take advantage of the on-site BBQ facilities to whip up a feast of your own.
offer_address: Cnr Of Griffith St And Wharf St, Tweed Heads, New South Wales, 2485, Australia
